name: Arduboy Game Package
summary: An ARDUBOY file is a Zip-compressed game package used by Arduboy, an open-source 8-bit handheld gaming system. It stores a .HEX file that contains the compiled game code, a banner image (700 × 192 pixels), and one or more preview screenshots (128 × 64 pixels). ARDUBOY files also contain a required .JSON file ( info.json ) file, which includes metadata such as the game's title, version, author, and input configuration details.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
